EmailTemplate.name: Decoding Grocery.Send Email 3.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance! GX Registration is Closing…
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Decoding today’s new consumer behavior: Register for our new Grocery Experience (GX) webinar August 20, 2020 | 1-2pm ET ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> 56% of grocery shoppers say they’re more likely to use in-store pickup rather than browsing in your stores.
Seismic shifts like these are accelerating amid the pandemic. The question is—are you prepared?
Register now for our Grocery Experience (GX) webinar to understand and serve consumers who are radically different.
You’ll get market insights from IHL and hear first-hand from two leading grocers about what they’re seeing and how they’re adapting. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Date: August 20, 2020 Time: 1-2pm Eastern Speakers & Panelists:
- Tom Chittenden, Vice President, NCR Retail Products - Greg Buzek, Founder and President of IHL Group - Lou Labenskyj, Chief Information Security Officer of Bashas - Harrison Lewis, CIO of Northgate Market ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
